DataElement.preferredDefinition: Characteristic or indicative of (e.g., a disease)._A liquid tissue; its major function is to transport oxygen throughout the body. It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood._Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms._Collected; brought together in one place._Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A specific individual microbe and its genetically identical progeny separated on a single occasion from a sample taken from a host or culture system._the date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

It also supplies the tissues with nutrients, removes waste products, and contains various components of the immune system defending the body against infection. Several hormones also travel in the blood._Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms._Collected; brought together in one place._Any laboratory procedure for growing microorganisms._A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis._A specific individual microbe and its genetically identical progeny separated on a single occasion from a sample taken from a host or culture system.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A specific individual microbe and its genetically identical progeny separated on a single occasion from a sample taken from a host or culture system.:A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Concepts.definition: A specific individual microbe and its genetically identical progeny separated on a single occasion from a sample taken from a host or culture system.

A part of a thing, or of several things, taken to demonstrate or to determine the character of the whole, e.g. a substance, or portion of material obtained for use in testing, examination, or study; particularly, a preparation of tissue or bodily fluid taken for examination or diagnosis.

Property.preferredDefinition: Collected; brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: Collected; brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
